This is a great belt! It's not as flimsy as a lot of fashion belts tend to bit. The stones and studs are all securely attached, and it's very thick. Im a clumsy person, so this poor belt has to deal with a lot of abuse, but its held up well! It feels like real leather, but it is not real leather! I'm usually a size 4 (5'7", 135 lbs) pre holidays, I could use the 30-33" size on the middle hole. Post holidays, I've had to move it out one hole, but it fits me great still! The buckle is very sturdy and pretty; I love the look of the metal! This is definitely worth trying out; make sure you know your size though! It comes with a punch to make additional holes, but I can't imagine you could add too many more because of the studs!
Love the touch of bling this belt adds to plain old jeans and a t-shirt. Well made with plenty of holes for the perfect fit.

I got this to wear to a western-themed birthday party, and overall I was very happy with it. I like that it isn’t very wide as I’m petite. I saw some people say that it runs small, but I determined my pant size by measuring around the top of my jeans and then ordered according to that and found that it was actually on the longer side. But I rarely wear belts so maybe that wasn’t the right way to get the waist measurement.
This belt is made very well and is super cute. Its the only one I’ve found that is small enough to it my waist without adding holes.

July 17 2023 edit: My review goes from 5 stars to 2 stars. The belt, worn daily for two months, started looking ragged about three weeks ago, and this morning it tore apart where he buckles it. Cheap material is the only reason. The belt wasn't over-tightened or abused.  Original review: My husband recently whittled his waist size from 36 to 34 and badly needed a new belt to go with his new jeans. I showed him this one, never noticing it says it's for women, and he loved the looks. Once it arrived, he loved the fit, too.  It's a bit narrower (still on the wide side as a woman's belt) than his usual belts, meaning he can use it with pants that aren't wide-looped jeans when he wants. It fits his jeans loops just fine. The silver parts are inexpensive but they look good, and the leather belt itself is nicely tooled.  The belt is the correct length, as advertised. We're very happy with it.

As someone commented in another review, it is a bit thinner than expected but I still wear it and it fits perfectly. I did find that hitting the notches was not as easy as most belts when first trying it on.  I took it off knowing which notch fit my waist and gave it a minor stretch and now it buckles very easily. It's not a high end belt but definitely does serve it purpose, which for me is keeping some of my looser fitting pants at my waist instead of halfway down my butt.

My wife ordered this belt to wear with skirts and to cinch dresses. She really likes it and found it to be high quality. The size was much smaller than she expected, it was supposed to be for a 30" waist, but those are her measurements and it fit her on the second to last belt hole.

Love the detail. It’s really nice in person. Comes with a tool to customize fit. The buckle part isn’t top quality but it’s the look I was going for so I’m really happy with it. I’m 5ft about 120 and ordered the 30-32 and it fits fine.

This belt gives off a nice western look. It’s not too bulky but not to small, although it is a little smaller than I expected. It still looks great for every day wear. It’s not high quality like you would get from an actual western store but it’s more affordable and still looks nice. It comes with a hole punch incase you get a size too big and need more holes which is very nice. Overall the belt fits the price listed and I hope it will last for awhile!

This belt technically is unisex by design. It is 1inch wide so on the thinner side for a man belt so it would need to be with a formal suit.  It also fits slightly on the smaller size (not much) so just to keep in mind when ordering. Even if it is too big or too small, the belt comes with a tool to pierce more holes to better adjust.

The good impressions start from opening the package; everything is neatly pocketed in logo-imprinted bags, giving the impression of luxury and much more expensive product.  The belt itself doesn't disappoint either. The embossing is really nicely done, and the buckle and belt tip hardware look great too. I personally would have liked a more brushed steel look, but that's just my preference and not a fault in the product.  Even a punch tool for making more holes is included. Very pleased!

评论概述: This belt would be better for children than for adults!
评论详情: This belt does not have the feel of quality that my wife was expecting. It ran small in size so it did not fit well so she could not have worn it anyway. The "leather" does not look nor feel genuine and the hardware is light weight and looks cheap. We gave it to a 14 year old niece who absolutely loves it!!
This TOPACC Western Embossed Engraved Tooled Leather Belt is a very attractive belt and buckle. It runs true to size and is at a good price point.
Runs small!

This belt is perfect for everyday wear. The 1" width is a middle road between skinny and wide belt styles making it a fine choice for anytime. The belt pattern is a subtle classic western pattern without being flashy. The metal buckle, belt tip and keeper do look good but aren't as heavy duty as one might expect. We will see how they hold up over time. The hole punch that came with this belt is a welcome addition. I won't need it for this product but I'm happy to have it as a wardrobe tool for the future. It could be a lower price point but an overall winner.

I love the length color and detail of this belt. it’s always hard for me to find a good belt. That is the right size with enough holes and this one has it. It has a cute metal accent buckle and end of the belt.also comes with an extra metal piece not too sure what it’s for. But overall a good buy.
This is a very nice belt. Fits as expected. Nice color and buckle.

I enjoy western style belts, saw this one and thought it would fit the bill. It's pretty nice, it feels good in the hand, feels like decent quality material and sizing is true. I'm a 6ft male, and this belt does says it's unisex. It feels a bit dainty and slim for my frame but it still works well.

评论概述: Great tooling pattern, love that it comes with a hole punch
评论详情: This is a lovely belt, with good tooling patterns and that fresh leather smell. I especially like the fact that it comes with a leather belt hole punch so you can make additional holes if you gain a little or lose a lot. The belt is well made, buckle fastened, and no hanging threads. It's a nice piece to add to your collection.
This is a beautiful belt.  It says a western look, and while it does, its not cowboy look.  It is very well made, all leather, the fit was perfect, and a great value for the quality.

评论概述: Title misleading, PU leather, but nice buckle, a bit large
评论详情: Calls it "leather" in the title, but clarifies as polyurethane and "PU" leather in the details. It is an OK belt, but it does have that plastic feel. Buckle is nice though, and design is interesting, but it just doesn't look completely like a true "leather" belt.  Belt was a bit larger than expected. I ordered a medium which indicates it is for a 33"-35" waist. Overall length of the belt is about 45" and there are holes that will fit for a waist starting at 32" to 38", with a hole every inch. Style could be to have a lot of belt hanging over though?
Fits well. Looks great!
This is a very nice belt with lots of bling. Looks really good. Granddaughter loves it.

Needed a western belt for this upcoming concert since my last one broke. I didn't want to dish out 80+ dollars in a belt so, I hoped on there and was able to find exactly what I was looking for. Belt was under $20, it's light weight, has adjustable holes, and aesthetically pleasing. Glad I made this purchase!
Was a lot smaller than I expected but looked nice when I had to go to court. I can say that I highly recommend.
Comfortable and quality product.
I always get a large belt to have extra room but I can't even get the large past the first hole. Size up by 2! Other than that, it is cute. Just disappointing I can't really wear it too often.
This is a cute country western belt. Great for jeans or around waist with a dress. Fits as expected. Really cute design. Was kinda stiff at first.

The belt is made from high-quality leather and features intricate and eye-catching western-style engravings that give it a unique and stylish look.  The brown color is rich and versatile, making it easy to pair with any outfit. Whether I'm dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual for a day on the ranch, this belt always adds a touch of western flair to my look.  I was also impressed with the quality of the buckle and how well it stays secure throughout the day. I never have to worry about it coming undone or slipping down my hips.  Overall, I highly recommend the TOPACC Western Embossed Engraved Tooled Leather Belt. It's a stylish and durable accessory that will quickly become a staple in your wardrobe. Whether you're a cowgirl or just a fan of western style, this belt is a must-have.

Nice belt with excellent hardware. The really nice thing about this particular style is that the center holes go all the way around the belt, so if your sizing is a little off or you gain/loss weight, you will still be able to use it. It is fully adjustable, which is awesome. The finishing of the pleather weave is a little shoddy at the end where they just tucked it through the last hole and left half inch ends sticking out of the back of the belt. I need to come up with a way to tack them down so they don't work their way out of the hole.
